name: Adobe Digital Editions
content:
files:
- setup: http://download.adobe.com/pub/adobe/digitaleditions/ADE_2.0_Installer.exe
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Adobe/Adobe Digital Editions 2.0/DigitalEditions.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    app: corefonts
    arch: win32
    description: Installing corefonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet35sp1
    arch: win32
    description: Installing dotnet35sp1
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: windowscodecs
    arch: win32
    description: Installing windowscodecs
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Adobe Digital Editions 2.0
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
wine:
  version: 3.21-x86_64
